title: Central location for all the sites
text: This hotel has been fine. Had the superior room with breakfast. Quite close to the Louvre and we walked to all the major sites around the centre of Paris from here. Pantheon to the Champs Elysees. Hotel fine room normal size. Breakfast was good and plenty of it. Normal fare. Walkable to the Gare de Nord as well plenty of places to eat nearby. Try le Saotico turn right and immediately on the left. 50m. Excellent.
